title: What is going on Riot?
body: I honestly don't understand why I haven't hit honor level 3 yet. I am most often very positive and friendly in game and get consistent honors each game. I really am at my {{item:3091}}  of why I haven't hit honor 3 yet. I know that everyone's rate is different, but when almost everyone I play with is 4 or 5 and I get more honors than them, I really don't understand it. So please, if there is Rioter there, can you please give me a legitimate reason on why I haven't hit honor 3? I really am getting sick of contacting Riot and getting a copy-paste response. Thank you for your time.

replies.body: Even if you're seeing plenty of other Honor rank 3's and 4's, that doesn't necessarily mean you should be there already as well. There's a good chance other people have simply been playing more games or getting honored more often. Keep playing and you're sure to rank up eventually.
Can you guys help me too from there ,my connection isnt good and ıt ısnt about where ı am.Its's attack my game wıth Turk people thank you !!
